howItWorks.title: How does creating a personalized song work?
howItWorks.p1: Creating a personalized song with Criando M√∫sicas is simple and exciting. First, you tell us your story - it can be a love declaration, a tribute to someone special, a childhood memory or any moment you want to eternalize in music.
howItWorks.p2: Our artificial intelligence technology, combined with professional music production, transforms your words into a unique composition. You choose the musical style that best fits - from romantic country to upbeat pop, from inspiring gospel to energetic rock.
howItWorks.p3: Within 48 hours, you receive your exclusive song directly on WhatsApp, ready to move hearts, give as a gift and create unforgettable memories. It's the perfect gift for birthdays, weddings, Mother's Day, Father's Day, graduations and any special occasion.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before creating your song

questions.q: Do I need to know anything about music to create?
questions.a: You don't need to know anything about music. You just tell the story, we do the rest. It's simple: you write what you want to tell, choose the style and we transform it into music.

questions.q: How long does it take to receive my song?
questions.a: The average delivery time is up to 48 hours after you approve the lyrics. You track everything on the platform and receive notifications when your song is ready.

questions.q: Can I request changes to the lyrics?
questions.a: Yes! You receive two versions of lyrics to choose from and can request adjustments before approving. After you approve, the song production begins.

questions.q: Is the song really mine and exclusive?
questions.a: Yes! Each song is created from scratch, just for you. It will never be sold or used by anyone else. The song is yours forever.

questions.q: What musical styles do you make?
questions.a: We make various styles: Pop, Country, Rock, Brazilian Popular Music, Gospel, Funk, Forr√≥, Pagode, Bossa Nova and much more. You choose what fits your story.

questions.q: Can I make a song without lyrics (instrumental)?
questions.a: Yes! Instrumental songs are perfect for videos, podcasts or special moments. You choose the instruments and the mood you want.
Yes! Starting at $10, you can receive a personalized video with photos or clips, synchronized with your song. Perfect for sharing on social media.
We accept PIX, credit and debit card. Payment is 100% secure and you only pay after filling out the briefing. We also accept discount coupons.

questions.q: What if I don't like the result?
questions.a: Our satisfaction rate is 98%! The more details you put in the briefing, the better the song gets. You approve the lyrics before, so there are no surprises.

questions.q: Can I use the songs in monetized videos?
questions.a: Yes! The songs created are 100% original and you have all rights for commercial use, including monetization on YouTube, TikTok, Instagram and other platforms.

questions.q: How does the Creator subscription work?
questions.a: With the subscription, you receive credits every month to create songs. It's ideal for content creators who need multiple songs regularly.
Yes, Creator subscription credits renew monthly. Unused credits don't accumulate to the next month.
Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through the user panel. You continue with access until the end of the paid period.
